column5: I kind of remember seeing a post regarding a GOOD bait shop in either of these towns..... can anyone inform me???
When we used to go up 71 we would stop herewww.anglersproshop.ca/
In the centre of Sioux Narrows is the Sioux Sports Shop.
In Nestor Falls there is the Angler's Pro Shop. It's right next door to the Grocery store at Sabaskong Bay Road and the highway. Excellent selection. Here is a link:http://www.anglersproshop.ca/
One nice thing about the shop in Nestor is you can pre-order what you want and they'll have it ready and waiting when you get there..... Did that last time....Great service......
yeah...thats what we did too..at the time we had 12 in our group but we were still in and out in about 10 mins..also the convenience of the grocery right next door is an advantage
